summary: Complete end-to-end testing of CyberSentinelle network intrusion detection system completed successfully. All backend APIs (12/12) working perfectly, frontend navigation and functionality fully operational. Minor chart sizing warnings detected but not affecting core functionality.

design_issues.issue: Chart width/height showing -1 values causing console warnings
design_issues.details: Console warnings about chart dimensions but charts render correctly

passed_tests: All 12 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Home page stats display (samples, features, categories, accuracy)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard EDA, Model, Prediction, Clustering, Download)
Dataset info API endpoint returns proper data structure
EDA API endpoint returns visualizations data with charts rendering
Model training endpoint successfully trains Decision Tree and Random Forest
Model metrics endpoint returns accuracy, precision, recall, F1, AUC scores
Prediction endpoint works with normal traffic samples
Prediction endpoint works with attack traffic samples
Prediction results display properly with risk levels
Clustering results endpoint returns elbow method and PCA data
Notebook generation creates complete Jupyter notebook
Demo buttons populate prediction form correctly
All interactive buttons are clickable and functional
